name: Lada simulator 2015 (mrSavaelev)
description:
The detailed physics of the car's behavior, beautiful autumn landscapes make the picture more realistic, as well as the new time dilation system makes it possible to go into steep turns with jewelry precision and get a lot of completely new driving experiences.

 - Time dilation. 

- A choice of 3 camera angles for viewing.

 - Beautiful autumn landscapes. 

- Switchable soundtrack. 

- The ability to turn on the headlights.
